title: Number of Revenue Passenger-Miles, Pullman Company for United States
notes:
Data Refer To Passenger Miles For Paying Passengers. Source: United States Department Of Commerce, Survey Of Current Business, January 1939, P. 18

This NBER data series m03010h appears on the NBER website in Chapter 3 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter03.html.
